# ggNaruto

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of ggNaruto is to provide Colour palettes inspired by Naruto.

## Installation

You can install the released version of ggNaruto from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("ggNaruto")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(ggNaruto)
## basic example code
```
